problem_text_cn: 如图,已知点D为△ABC内一点,CD平分∠ACB,BD⊥CD,∠A=∠ABD,若AC=6,BC=4,则BD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the known point D is a point within △ABC, CD bisects ∠ACB, BD ⊥ CD, ∠A = ∠ABD, if AC = N_0, BC = N_1, then the length of BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:延长BD与AC交于点E,∵∠A=∠ABD,∴BE=AE,∵BD⊥CD,∴BE⊥CD,∵CD平分∠ACB,∴∠BCD=∠ECD,∴∠EBC=∠BEC,∴△BEC为等腰三角形,∴BC=CE,∵BE⊥CD,∴2BD=BE,∵AC=6,BC=4,∴CE=4,∴AE=AC-EC=6-4=2,∴BE=2,∴BD=1．故选:A．
